title: Bright Horizons Providing Child-Care Help for Workers
itunes:title: Bright Horizons Providing Child-Care Help for Workers
description:
Dr. William Haseltine, Chair and President of Access Health International, discusses record Covid cases as a result of the omicron variant. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Managing Diversity Reporter Jeff Green explain that kids are going to in-office daycare, even if their parents work remotely and how Bright Horizons Family Solutions is taking advantage of the situation. Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Dana Hull discusses Tesla delivering 308,600 vehicles worldwide in the fourth quarter, smashing the previous record for the electric-car maker. And we Drive to the Close with Steve Brown, Senior Portfolio Manager at American Century Investments.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
